mapper.insert: insert into guestboards (gid, hostid, content, view_scope) values (#{gid}, #{hostid}, #{content}, #{viewScope})
mapper.select: select * from guestboards order by gbid desc offset #{offset} rows fetch next #{limit} rows only
mapper.update: update guestboards set content = #{content}, view_scope = #{viewScope}, updated_at = sysdate where gbid = #{gbid}
